verses.verse: <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H6950>and<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1697>them,<s%> "These are the words which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> that you should do <S%H6213>them.<s%>

<S%H8337><s%> 'Six <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H4399>work<s%> be <S%H6213>done,<s%> but on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall be a holy <S%H6944>day<s%> for <S%H7676>you,<s%> a Sabbath of solemn <S%H7677>rest<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> whoever <S%H6213>does<s%> any <S%H4399>work<s%> in it shall be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
You shall <S%H1197>kindle<s%> no <S%H784>fire<s%> throughout your <S%H4186>habitations<s%> on the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>'"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "This is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947><s%> 'Take from among you an <S%H8641>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H3605>Whoever<s%> is of a <S%H5081>willing<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> let him <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H3068>it,<s%> Yahweh's <S%H8641>offering:<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H5178>brass,<s%>
<S%H8504>blue,<s%> <S%H713>purple,<s%> <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> <S%H5795>goats<s%>' hair,
<S%H352>rams<s%>' <S%H5785>skins<s%> dyed <S%H119>red,<s%> sea <S%H8476>cow<s%> <S%H5785>hides,<s%> <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%>
<S%H8081>oil<s%> for the <S%H3974>light,<s%> <S%H1314>spices<s%> for the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> and for the <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense,<s%>
<S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H68>stones<s%> to be <S%H4394>set<s%> for the <S%H646>ephod<s%> and for the <S%H2833>breastplate.<s%>
<S%H2450><s%>"'Let every wise-hearted <S%H3820>man<s%> among you <S%H935>come,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded:<s%>

the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> its outer <S%H4372>covering,<s%> its <S%H168>roof,<s%> its <S%H7165>clasps,<s%> its <S%H7175>boards,<s%> its <S%H1280>bars,<s%> its <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> and its <S%H134>sockets;<s%>
the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and its <S%H905>poles,<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat,<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of the <S%H4539>screen;<s%>
the <S%H7979>table<s%> with its <S%H905>poles<s%> and all its <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and the show <S%H6440>bread;<s%>
the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> also for the <S%H3974>light,<s%> with its <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> its <S%H5216>lamps,<s%> and the <S%H8081>oil<s%> for the <S%H3974>light;<s%>

and the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7004>incense<s%> with its <S%H905>poles,<s%> the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> the <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense,<s%> the <S%H4539>screen<s%> for the <S%H6607>door,<s%> at the door of the <S%H4908>tabernacle;<s%>

the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> with its <S%H4345>grating<s%> of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> it <S%H905>poles,<s%> and all its <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> the <S%H3595>basin<s%> and its <S%H3653>base;<s%>
the <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> its <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> their <S%H134>sockets,<s%> and the <S%H4539>screen<s%> for the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2691>court;<s%>
the <S%H3489>pins<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> the <S%H3489>pins<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> and their <S%H4340>cords;<s%>

the finely worked <S%H899>garments,<s%> for <S%H8278>ministering<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>place,<s%> the holy <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H899>garments<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> to minister in the <S%H3547>priest<s%>'s office.'"
All the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3318>departed<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

They <S%H935>came,<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> stirred him <S%H5375>up,<s%> and everyone whom his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> made <S%H5068>willing,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H8641>offering,<s%> for the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> and for all of its <S%H5656>service,<s%> and for the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments.<s%>

They <S%H935>came,<s%> <S%H5921>both<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> and <S%H802>women,<s%> as many <S%H3605>as<s%> <S%H5081>were<s%> <S%H3820>willing-hearted,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H2397>brooches,<s%> <S%H5141>earrings,<s%> signet <S%H2885>rings,<s%> and <S%H3558>armlets,<s%> all <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold;<s%> even every <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H5130>offered<s%> an <S%H8573>offering<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H376>Everyone,<s%> with whom was <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H8504>blue,<s%> <S%H713>purple,<s%> <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> <S%H5795>goats<s%>' <S%H352>hair,<s%> rams' <S%H5785>skins<s%> dyed <S%H119>red,<s%> and sea <S%H8476>cow<s%> <S%H5785>hides,<s%> brought <S%H935>them.<s%>

Everyone who <S%H7311>offered<s%> an <S%H8641>offering<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H5178>brass<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H8641>offering;<s%> and <S%H4672>everyone,<s%> with whom was found <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> for any <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service,<s%> brought <S%H935>it.<s%>

All the <S%H802>women<s%> who <S%H2450>were<s%> <S%H3820>wise-hearted<s%> <S%H2901>spun<s%> with their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> that which they had <S%H4299>spun,<s%> the <S%H8504>blue,<s%> the <S%H713>purple,<s%> the <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> and the fine <S%H8336>linen.<s%>
All the <S%H802>women<s%> whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5375>stirred<s%> them up in <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H2901>spun<s%> the <S%H5795>goats<s%>' hair.
The <S%H5387>rulers<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and the <S%H68>stones<s%> to be <S%H4394>set,<s%> for the <S%H646>ephod<s%> and for the <S%H2833>breastplate;<s%>
and the <S%H1314>spice,<s%> and the <S%H8081>oil<s%> for the <S%H3974>light,<s%> for the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and for the <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> a freewill <S%H5071>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> made them <S%H5068>willing<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> for all the <S%H4399>work,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to be <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H7200>"Behold,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H7121>called<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1212>Bezalel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H221>Uri,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2354>Hur,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

He has <S%H4390>filled<s%> him with the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> in <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> in <S%H8394>understanding,<s%> in <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> and in all kinds of <S%H4399>workmanship;<s%>
and to <S%H2803>make<s%> skillful <S%H4284>works,<s%> to <S%H6213>work<s%> in <S%H2091>gold,<s%> in <S%H3701>silver,<s%> in <S%H5178>brass,<s%>

in <S%H2799>cutting<s%> of <S%H68>stones<s%> for <S%H4390>setting,<s%> and in <S%H2799>carving<s%> of <S%H6086>wood,<s%> to <S%H6213>work<s%> in all kinds of <S%H4284>skillful<s%> <S%H4399>workmanship.<s%>

He has <S%H5414>put<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%> that he may <S%H3384>teach,<s%> both <S%H171>he,<s%> and Oholiab, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H294>Ahisamach,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan.<s%>

He has <S%H4390>filled<s%> them with <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of <S%H3820>heart,<s%> to <S%H6213>work<s%> all kinds of <S%H4399>workmanship,<s%> of the <S%H2796>engraver,<s%> of the skillful <S%H2803>workman,<s%> and of the <S%H7551>embroiderer,<s%> in <S%H8504>blue,<s%> in <S%H713>purple,<s%> in <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> and in fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and of the <S%H707>weaver,<s%> even of those who <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4399>workmanship,<s%> and of those who <S%H2803>make<s%> skillful <S%H4399>works.<s%>
